name: Hero Plus
description: Hero Plus is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) based on a story written by three generations of Chinese novelists. It is free to play with cash shop items available, much like The Legend of Ares, Scions of Fate, Silkroad Online and many other MMORPG's.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP, Vista Processor: PentiumIII 800MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphic geforce 2MX or higher Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windowns8, Windows10 Processor: PentiumIV 1.8MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: geforce4 MX440, ATI Radeon 9200 or higher Storage: 5 GB available space
